SEARCH:
程序包 Controller.task

类 Task_kid_control

java.lang.Object
java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
Controller.task.Task_kid_control
所有已实现的接口:
MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener
public class Task_kid_control extends MouseAdapter
The Task_kid_control class handles the control logic for the task kid GUI. It extends MouseAdapter to handle mouse events.

  • 构造器概要

    Constructs a new Task_kid_control with the specified kid.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Task_kid_control

      public Task_kid_control(Kids kid)
      Constructs a new Task_kid_control with the specified kid.
      参数:
      kid - the kid entity to be controlled

  • 方法详细资料

    • setGUI

      public void setGUI(Task_kid GUI)
      Sets the GUI for this controller.
      参数:
      GUI - the Task_kid GUI to be controlled

    • addButtonControl

      public void addButtonControl()
      Adds button controls to the GUI. This method should be implemented to add mouse listeners to the buttons.

    • getKid

      public Kids getKid()
      Returns the kid entity controlled by this controller.
      返回:
      the kid entity

    • taskButton

      public boolean taskButton(int index)
      Handles the task button click event. If the task's destination is "x", it shows a warning and returns false. Otherwise, it performs some operations (e.g., sending a message) and returns true.
      参数:
      index - the index of the task
      返回:
      true if the task's destination is not "x", false otherwise

    • taskInfo

      public String taskInfo(int index)
      Returns the task information for the specified task index. If the task is confirmed, it returns a message with the reward. Otherwise, it returns a message with the task's name.
      参数:
      index - the index of the task
      返回:
      the task information

    • mouseClicked

      public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e, int i)
      Handles the mouse click event. If the task button action returns true, it shows a dialog.
      参数:
      e - the mouse event
      i - the index of the task button clicked
